channel.title: Javac error..help? :3
channel.description:
:confused: ok well i already did the tutorials on youtube on forums on the environmental variables i fixed the Path so it can go to java files but the CLASSPATH i dont know what i did and now thats the reason im stuck..what should i have for CLASSPATH?? :confused:
help is much appreciated ...

item.title: Javac error..help? :3
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

umm k 1 sec[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2009, 08:57:12 pm[/size][hr]open not pad paste this:

@echo off cd ../src echo Compiling all files.... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java pause

Then save as build.cmd put in your folder and use that

again change java to your version

item.description:

and btw on the path one its like this actualy

.%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Program Files\ATI Technologies\ATI.ACE\Core-Static;C:\PROGRA~1\COMMON~1\ULEADS~1\MPEG;C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\80\Tools\Binn;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem:C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16

its all that and thats how it works
but for CLASSPATH all i got is …
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

i think im missing something…?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2009, 08:36:09 pm[/size][hr]btw - ty so much for ur time …

item.title: Javac error..help? :3
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

OK first find out your java version.

then do:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

say you have 5 update 4 change it to:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_4\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Read full topic
